author: Al Jazeera
title: Nearly 3,000 sailors to leave carrier amid virus outbreak
description: Fewer than 100 of the nearly 5,000 sailors assigned to the USS Theodore Roosevelt have tested positive for the virus.
content:
Nearly 3,000 sailors aboard a United States aircraft carrier where the coronavirus has spread will be taken off the ship by Friday, Navy officials said as they struggle to quarantine crew members in the face of an outbreak.
So far, fewer than 100 of the near… [+3025 chars]
